meanings.definition: The quality of being devoted or loyal.
meanings.sent1: Her devotedness to her family is unwavering.
meanings.sent2: The devotedness of the dog to its owner was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His devotedness to his favorite sports team sometimes borders on obsession.
meanings.sent4: The devotedness of the sun to the sky is like a constant embrace.
meanings.sent5: The devotedness of the old tree to the earth is a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The state of being dedicated or committed.
meanings.sent1: His devotedness to his work is admirable.
meanings.sent2: The devotedness of the students to their studies paid off in good grades.
meanings.sent3: The devotedness of the chef to creating the perfect dish is evident in every bite.
meanings.sent4: The devotedness of the marathon runner to training is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The devotedness of the artist to their craft shines through in every brushstroke.

meanings.definition: The act of showing love or affection towards someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her devotedness to her pet cat is heart-melting.
meanings.sent2: The devotedness of the child to their favorite toy is adorable.
meanings.sent3: The devotedness of the toddler to their bedtime story is a nightly ritual.
meanings.sent4: The devotedness of the flower to the sun's warmth is a natural beauty.
meanings.sent5: The devotedness of the baby to their mother's lullaby is pure joy.
